author: Reuters Editorial
title: Onemain Holdings, Inc. Announces Proposed Senior Notes Offering
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:46 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Onemain Holdings, Inc. Announces Proposed Senior Notes Offering Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Onemain Holdings Inc:
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES PROPOSED SENIOR NOTES OFFERING
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS - UNIT IS PROPOSING TO OFFER UP TO $500 MILLION OF SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026
* ONEMAIN HOLDINGS INC - UNIT TO USE PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO REDEEM REMAINING $400 MILLION IN PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF COâ€™S 7.250% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2021 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
